title: Threesomes
description: A sizzling collection of short stories about creative ways three people can enjoy erotic adventures together. Whether it's two men and a woman, two women and a man, or same-sex threesomes, these triads find interesting and inspiring ways to get it on.Contributors include:Hobart GlasseCynthia GentryMercy LoomisLaura NeilsenReno LarkEm BrownBrit M.Kilt KilpatrickTony WardsTroy SeateElizabeth MietteTrinity Blacio
author: Lori Perkins
